question: The theme of 2017 World Hydrography Day is ___________.
option1: Hydrography - much more than just nautical charts
option2: Our seas and waterways - yet to be fully charted and explored
option3: International Hydrographic Cooperation - supporting safe navigation
option4: Mapping our seas, oceans and waterways - more important than ever
answer: Mapping our seas, oceans and waterways - more important than ever
explanation: The 2017 theme is "Mapping our seas, oceans and waterways - more important than ever". The World Hydrography Day (WHD) is observed every year on June 21 to publicise the work of hydrographers and to create awareness about hydrography which is an essential science before undertaking any activity on or under the sea.
